data.name: CaptionShape
desc: The CaptionShape represents a rectangular drawing shape with an additional set of lines.
It can be used as a description for a fixed point inside a drawing.

properties.name: CaptionAngle
desc: This property specifies the escape angle of the line of a caption.
It is only used if CaptionIsFixedAngle is set to TRUE

properties.name: CaptionEscapeAbsolute
desc: This property specifies the absolute escape distance for the line of a caption.

properties.name: CaptionEscapeDirection
desc: This property specifies the escape direction for the line of a caption.

properties.name: CaptionEscapeRelative
desc: This property specifies the relative escape distance for the line of a caption.

properties.name: CaptionGap
desc: This property specifies the distance between the text area of the caption and the start of the line.

properties.name: CaptionIsEscapeRelative
desc: If this property is TRUE, the property CaptionEscapeRelative is used, else the property CaptionEscapeAbsolute is used.

properties.name: CaptionIsFitLineLength
desc: If this property is TRUE, the application determines the best possible length for the caption line.

properties.name: CaptionIsFixedAngle
desc: This property specifies if the escape angle of the line of a caption is fixed or free.
If this is set to FALSE, the application can choose the best possible angle. If not, the value in CaptionAngle is used.

properties.name: CaptionLineLength
desc: This property specifies the length of the caption line.

properties.name: CaptionPoint
desc: The caption point property specify the position of the point that is captioned.
A set of lines are rendered from the caption area.

properties.name: CaptionType
desc: This property specifies the geometry of the line of a caption.

properties.name: CornerRadius
desc: This is the radius of the caption area corners.
